name: Wizz's Bounce Fiasco
description:
A Game made for two game jams 

I know crazy right the first is Trijam#59 : If you Don't hear it, It doesn't Exist

The seconds is 7DRL Challenge 2020.

So i mixed the two together by making a rougelike style game were the world and the obstacles and randomly generated. With each level the world gets bigger to a limit. 

Using the theme of the Trijam the creatures you must try and catch are only visible when ether caught or you can hear them.  For evey three moves the player makes the creatures make one move each. 

WASD = movement 

Arrow keys = Fine movement

Space bar = Drop the net on the tile your looking at 

Story: 

Wizz the mage was in their lab one day, working on a potion that was more stable in the roguelike world. No randomness wanted by this mage. While working on this potion one of his pets escaped. This creature multiplies faster than any other creature in the world, so Wizz had to drop everything and try and catch all of these creatures before they upset the ecosystem. 

Help Wizz catch as many as possible before having to return home. 3 hits and you're out.
